name: Lost Time Clock
description: From the series “Time Is A Construct.” A black and white drawing of a clock, with the hour and minute hands pointing at empty spaces where the 7 and 3 should be. The clock is also missing hour numbers: 2, 4, 9 and 11. For those days when you lose track of time. Background #ffffff, 2048px by 2048px, 2021, edition of 50. @somanysoftspots
